review_title: A small college in the midwest
job_title: Anonymous Employee in Kansas City, MO
pros: Flexible schedule, understanding bosses, benefits are OK, a "family environment." Many people like the small atmosphere. There is daily interaction with all levels of employees. It is interesting working in the education field.
cons: Pay is on the lower end, unless you're management. Many decisions are made top-down. Sometimes the "family environment" is over the top. There is very little training.

review_title: Fine job to get a little experience and a little spending money.
job_title: Library Clerk in Kansas City, MO
pros: Calvary Bible College was an just an okay workplace in that it is a minimum wage job. I got experience.
cons: Never really felt like I was doing a great job, but I did have good relationships with the other workers.
